
A careless admin reused a prime to generate two RSA keys. Find the shared factor and recover the hidden message: ciphertext1: 127060369023375546768769454059616429377252153620610790279430521712902681543371178265039066210259416560448954848343969487184467607953635656929991457049368950038354526212774769628757020438012463529994449198388233456127765279015976363, ciphertext2: 481871057289780054513769650179816738595211000298504371146248150783792158372517195824279903821244309544140706308517039238524562585648200906474943813348750186009141798241674537133856346426707199972974583960998408950135267399666718959


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=898827830082431285805169634148559639441898421319937816274227834636192756869828630090200471803769283587427843729764860374803987759097754083903281954201499233536789116623755315397861862274934103971425782013666112731894540511328199759, n2=1269988534198162426678902782427831508008256803654618474181683355330817256670548028146893354855962619992277065008616674713762054262425285352269115621862111089120529564688858506396956827679479712577610211900220127673777436098067133407, e=876174763493483838825896741920531824941238909329702846277438797977282996211023539801401652802733186384298587476283727963611484203940757245556677154444684883694492423957435159295976184537532494755183968998610681921830514972454456983

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{8nptr59s}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 127060369023375546768769454059616429377252153620610790279430521712902681543371178265039066210259416560448954848343969487184467607953635656929991457049368950038354526212774769628757020438012463529994449198388233456127765279015976363, ciphertext2: 481871057289780054513769650179816738595211000298504371146248150783792158372517195824279903821244309544140706308517039238524562585648200906474943813348750186009141798241674537133856346426707199972974583960998408950135267399666718959
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=898827830082431285805169634148559639441898421319937816274227834636192756869828630090200471803769283587427843729764860374803987759097754083903281954201499233536789116623755315397861862274934103971425782013666112731894540511328199759, n2=1269988534198162426678902782427831508008256803654618474181683355330817256670548028146893354855962619992277065008616674713762054262425285352269115621862111089120529564688858506396956827679479712577610211900220127673777436098067133407, e=876174763493483838825896741920531824941238909329702846277438797977282996211023539801401652802733186384298587476283727963611484203940757245556677154444684883694492423957435159295976184537532494755183968998610681921830514972454456983
extra_info: p=26148235926097903283293720941861526031314394171301907079542124629093181714778102079394839340401684858943821056178151, q=34374320035308141230847323109349085871151249731573480569110881912587954372833318949660417522096885278188565302936409, r=36945851813029990788777297686072523003209700194732244410828735075833897236668214414831575920956044123752947326444023, φ(n1)=898827830082431285805169634148559639441898421319937816274227834636192756869828630090200471803769283587427843729764799852248026353053239942859230743589596767892886241236106662391320181138846492550396726756803614161757408124969085200, φ(n2)=1269988534198162426678902782427831508008256803654618474181683355330817256670548028146893354855962619992277065008616603393590205924293265727648320200253236728170603258963878566779968405827870211044245719906777074744375494585437752976
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
